trans:
EXTRA PADDING BETWEEN THE BEDS AT THE REAR LONGITUDINAL
SINGLE BEDS APPROX. 197x80 CM WITH Z-ZONE
COLD FOAM MATTRESS
LONGITUDINAL SINGLE BEDS WITH LADDER
SLEEPING SYSTEM WITH ADJUSTABLE MATTRESS FRAME
EXTRA-SPACIOUS INDOOR SHOWER WITH WOODEN GRATE
COMFORT DOOR WITH WINDOW;
BLACKOUT BLINDS AND
GARBAGE CAN
AMBIENT LIGHTING DIMMABLE
GARMIN EMPIRE BUS SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING ALL
ON-BOARD FUNCTIONS
TRUMA AIR-CONDITIONING SYSTEM CAN ALSO BE
OPERATED WITHOUT SHORELINE POWER
CENTRAL LOCKING FOR THE BODY DOORS
COOKING WITH INDUCTION AND GAS
GAS OVEN
152 LITRE COMPRESSOR FRIDGE WITH FREEZER COMPARTMENT

HOT WATER BOILER, UNDERFLOOR HEATING AND
CONVECTORS

ENGINE HEAT
